title: Riot needs a defensive item besides GA for adcs
body: Playing any adc against most assassins is a terrible experience. Rengar ults, goes invis, then jumps on you and one shots you ect. with no counterplay available to you other than to flash.  Its a really bad experience, especially in low elo where games are way less cordinated.  Im suggesting a zhoynas for adcs or something of the like, maybe some boots?  I understand assassins should counter adcs but i dont think feeling like you have no counterplay is healthy.

Only fed assassins will blow through it. Having an extra 240-600 HP for their combo forces them to commit more resources to killing you, if they can even get through it at all. 

The point of marksman is that they don't need to aim their damage, so their skill expression is in their positioning. Finding that balance between being close enough to deal sustained damage but far enough away to not get blown up is what separates good marksman players from the bad ones. If marksman were simply able to itemize their weaknesses away entirely, it would negate all the skill of playing marksman and make it all boil down to who can have better stats. 

Items like {{item:3046}} , {{item:3156}} , and {{item:3026}} are the closest thing marksman can have to defensive items. They're not horrible options, but they won't keep you alive through everything. That's the point. 

Marksman are balanced around being squishy and dependent on their team. If you want to wade into the thick of things while dishing out damage, play a fighter.

I didn't imply that Tanks needed to be Support. Most "Tank" Supports are absolutely trash at soaking damage if they are the only front line you have. I DID say "Shield Supports". There was a time when Shield Supports were strong enough to negate a LOT of assassin damage. Now, Assassins blow you up through shields anyway. 

When I mentioned Tanks, I wasn't suggesting Tank Supports. I was suggesting Tanks period. Especially Top Lane Tanks. Currently, they are useless in lane and don't survive long enough outside of lane to be viable. Especially if the enemy team has a Vayne that can kill you in 6 or less auto attacks despite having a 800+ armor and 4k+ Health Malphite. 

ADC's don't need defensive options or you make Fighters irrelevant. In a traditional ideal scenario, the ADC's primary job is to kill the enemy tanks faster than the enemy ADC kills your tanks. Enchanter Supports do their best to keep the ADC alive, Assassins look for angles/opportunities to delete them, the Tanks will soak as much damage as possible while disengaging to try to peel for the ADC, and Control Mages will try to zone enemies way from being able to effectively deal damage. ^^^ This is more like the balance you will want. 

ADC > Tank
Tank > Assassin
Assassin > ADC

If we include control mages?

Control Mage in a controlled siege or anti siege....

Control Mage > ADC
Control Mage > Assassin
Tank > Control Mage

Control Mage when not protected by turret or team.....

ADC > Control Mage
Assassin > Control Mage
Tank > Control Mage

ADCs can itemize to survive and 1 v 1 an assassin but the issue is that they just don't because the enemy adc building glass cannon will just do more damage in the team fights.

You can't be a god at 1 v 1s and 5 v 5s.

As an adc player I know the pains of getting oneshot, I made you a list of things that can help

You have ga
You have the tabis and mercs
You have the phantom dancer and firecannon
You have bloodthirster and death's dance
You have the maw and mercurial
Some ads can use wits end, black cleaver or iceborn gautlet pretty effectively
You have runes that you can set up to give you more survivability and you can get a free 1time zhonya

Also with experience you can avoid getting oneshot most of the time by using smart positioning and waiting for the threat to use their cooldowns

However don't buy items on this list that wouldn't fit your build ex. If you are playin a crit champ go for tabi/merc pd ie bt ga ldr/3rd-crit
{{item:3025}}  Can be used on most adc's.  This will stop Rengar from one shotting you while still providing some offensive stats with sheen, mana, and cdr.

I'd rather just be allowed to outplay assassins when I'm an ADC. I'm not asking to autowin fights or for more defensive stats, just for their kits to allow me to at least survive a 1v1 if I'm not massively fed and I'm better than them.

Almost like multiple playstyles being allowed in the game would be fun....
